name: df-mbf
body: |- wceq(cmbf, crab(s0, co(cc, cpm, cr), wral(s1, crn(cioo), wa(wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cre, cv(s0))), cv(s1)), cdm(cvol)), wcel(cima(ccnv(ccom(cim, cv(s0))), cv(s1)), cdm(cvol))))))
comment: Define the class of measurable functions on the reals. A real function is measurable if the preimage of every open interval is a measurable set (see ~ ismbl ) and a complex function is measurable if the real and imaginary parts of the function is measurable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)
